name: Flat White
description: Smooth espresso with creamy steamed milk, topped with a touch of foam.

name: Macchiato
description: Bold espresso with a hint of frothy milk or sweet caramel.

name: Irish Coffee
description: Hot coffee with Irish whiskey, brown sugar, and a creamy topping.

name: Affogato
description: Espresso poured over vanilla gelato—a warm and cold treat.

name: Cortado
description: Equal parts espresso and steamed milk—a balanced blend.

name: Cold Brew
description: Smooth coffee brewed cold, served over ice.

name: Nitro Cold Brew
description: Creamy cold brew infused with nitrogen—like coffee meets a cloud.

name: Iced Latte
description: Chilled espresso with milk over ice—a refreshing sip.

name: Frappuccino
description: Blended coffee with milk, ice, and flavors—a creamy delight.

name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee
description: Strong coffee with sweetened condensed milk over ice.

name: Matcha Latte
description: Green tea powder with steamed milk—a soothing drink.

name: Chai Latte
description: Spiced tea with steamed milk—a cozy favorite.

name: Dirty Chai Latte
description: Spiced tea with espresso—a bold and spicy mix.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Espresso with vanilla, milk, and caramel—a sweet treat.

name: Café au Lait
description: Coffee with equal parts steamed milk—a classic combo.

name: Espresso Con Panna
description: Espresso topped with whipped cream—a simple pleasure.

name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
description: Espresso with pumpkin spice syrup and steamed milk—perfect for fall.

name: White Chocolate Mocha
description: Espresso with white chocolate, milk, and foam—a creamy delight.

name: Toffee Nut Latte
description: Espresso with toffee nut syrup and milk—a nutty indulgence.
